panels.description:
in check and heal process, if any of the sentinel checks are failing, it is reported here.

```
IP of sentinel instance (if applicable) -> Check / Operation performed that failed
```
panels.title: Sentinel Checks - Unhealthy

panels.description:
in check and heal process, if any of the redis checks are failing, it is reported here.

```
IP of redis instance (if applicable) -> Check / Operation performed
```
panels.title: Redis Checks - Unhealthy

panels.description:
in check and heal process, steps that have been successfully executed are reported here

in check and heal process, steps that have been successfully executed are reported here

reading the legend
```
IP of sentinel instance (if applicable) -> Check / Operation performed
```
panels.title: Sentinel Checks - Healthy

panels.description:
in check and heal process, steps that have been successfully executed are reported here

reading the legend
```
IP of redis instance (if applicable) -> Check / Operation performed
```

```
panels.title: Redis Checks - Healthy

panels.description:
kubernetes API calls that resulted in failure.

reading the legend:
```
namespace -> kind -> resource -> operation -> error
```

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, kind, name, operation, err) (rate(redis_operator_controller_k8s_operations_total{name=~"$kubernetesResource", status="FAIL"}[$bucket_interval])) > 0

panels.title: k8s ops - failures / second

panels.description:
Reading the legend
```
REDIS/SENTINEL -> IP address -> Operation Performed -> Error Encounted
```

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, kind, operation, status, IP, err) (rate(redis_operator_controller_redis_operations_total{IP=~"$redis_pod_ip|$sentinel_pod_ip",status="FAIL", err!="SENTINEL_REGEX_NOT_FOUND"}[$bucket_interval])) > 0

panels.title: redis ops - failures / second
